message: Accept this and we can call it a day!
Let's split it down the middle, it's a fair deal!
You said it was a fair deal last round, but now you're trying to take more? I'm not buying it!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm not going to take it from here, Bob. You're getting closer to a fair deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I think we're getting close, let's meet in the middle again!
